00020 template <class Changeable>
00021 class TChangeNotifier: public istd::TPointerBase<Changeable>
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef istd::TPointerBase<Changeable> BaseClass;
00025 
00026        explicit TChangeNotifier(Changeable* changeablePtr = NULL, int changeFlags = IChangeable::CF_MODEL, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr = NULL);
00027        TChangeNotifier(const TChangeNotifier& notifier);

00062 
00063 template <class Changeable>
00064 TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::TChangeNotifier(Changeable* changeablePtr, int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr)
00065 :      BaseClass(changeablePtr),
00066        m_changeFlags(changeFlags),
00067        m_updateParamsPtr(updateParamsPtr)
00068 {
00069        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00070               changeablePtr->BeginChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00071        }
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 template <class Changeable>
00076 TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::TChangeNotifier(const TChangeNotifier& notifier)
00077 :      BaseClass(notifier),
00078        m_changeFlags(notifier.m_changeFlags),
00079        m_updateParamsPtr(notifier.m_updateParamsPtr)
00080 {
00081        if (BaseClass::IsValid()){
00082               BaseClass::operator->()->BeginChanges(notifier.m_changeFlags, notifier.m_updateParamsPtr);
00083        }
00084 }

00087 template <class Changeable>
00088 TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::~TChangeNotifier()
00089 {
00090        Reset();
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 template <class Changeable>
00095 void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::SetPtr(Changeable* changeablePtr)
00096 {
00097        if (changeablePtr != BaseClass::GetPtr()){
00098               Reset();
00099 
00100               BaseClass::SetPtr(changeablePtr);
00101 
00102               if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00103                      changeablePtr->BeginChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00104               }
00105        }
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 template <class Changeable>
00110 inline void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::Reset()
00111 {
00112        Changeable* changeablePtr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00113 
00114        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00115               changeablePtr->EndChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00116 
00117               BaseClass::Reset();
00118        }
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 template <class Changeable>
00123 inline void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::Abort()
00124 {
00125        Changeable* changeablePtr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00126 
00127        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00128               changeablePtr->EndChanges(m_changeFlags | IChangeable::CF_ABORTED, m_updateParamsPtr);
00129 
00130               BaseClass::Reset();
00131        }
00132 }
